title: Dragon Wings and Wind Kingdom - Novel Updates
tags: Animal Characteristics   Female Protagonist   Magic   Priests   Transported to Another World
author: Fujiya Murasaki   紫藤夜
description:
I’m supposed to be a normal high school girl, but now I have big black bat-like wings on my back.
I’m not wearing a costume. I can’t take it off even if I pull it off.
A person wearing a white hooded cloak is standing in front of me.
“I’m here for you.”
The person in the cloak extends his hand toward me.
“Where are you going?”
I asked fearfully.
“To the world where you were born.”
What does he mean?
No, no, I’m Japanese.

A high school girl is taken to a world guarded by spirits as a wind maiden who breaks the seal of the temple’s wind mirror, and travels with the queen, king, and priests of that world to save the demon-infested kingdom of the wind.

This is a story of another continent in the world of the story of the Black and Silver Wolves.>
